titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the King and Queen, upon Ephes. 5.16. Redeeming the time, because the days are evil. By the Reverend Father Philip Ellis monk of the H. Order of St. Benedict, and of the English Congr. chaplain and preacher in ordinary to their Majesties. Published by His Majesties command
titleStmt.author: Ellis, Philip, 1652-1726.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Henry Hills, printer to the King's most excellent Majesty, for his houshold and chapel,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Trinity College Library, Dublin.
